This volume in the Content Review Plus Practice Series polishes your knowledge of pediatric nursing while sharpening your critical thinking and test-taking skills. 

Each chapter offers a concise, yet comprehensive review of the topic, followed by NCLEX-style questions in both multiple-choice and alternate-item formats. Rationales for both correct and incorrect answers, as well as test-taking tips, explain how to apply critical thinking to the question typesÃ¢â‚¬â€great preparation for classroom exams and the NCLEX-RNÃ‚Â® Exam. 

A unique, visual approach with succinct, bulleted outlines, charts, and illustrations helps you build a solid foundation. From normal growth and development, care of the hospitalized child, and medication administration to coverage of the pathology and nursing and medical management of the full-range of pediatric diseases and disordersÃ¢â‚¬â€easy-to-follow outlines in every chapter review exactly what you need to know
